assessments.status_rationale: Today’s bullets contain no reporting about Bank of Japan policy-rate decisions or forward guidance. The deadline (2026-04-30) is still in the future.

News that Oracle joined an investor group to run TikTok’s U.S. business suggests ongoing efforts to keep TikTok operating, but it does not clearly establish whether TikTok will (or will not) be available for download in both U.S. app stores on 2026-06-30. The claim remains a future-dated availability check.
No items in today’s news address EU final adoption of a €20B+ Ukraine support instrument explicitly financed by proceeds from frozen Russian sovereign assets. Deadline remains in the future.

Today’s news discusses Trump’s move to reclassify cannabis (Schedule III-related), but provides no clear evidence that the IRS has published guidance stating §280E no longer applies and that it is effective for tax year 2026. The prediction is specifically about IRS guidance publication by 2026-12-31.
No TrendForce/DRAMeXchange DDR5 16Gb contract price report or comparison versus December 2025 levels appears in today’s bullets. Deadline is in the future.

No Nike earnings release or Greater China revenue figures are included in today’s news bullets. The relevant fiscal Q3 2026 release is also future-dated relative to the prediction deadline (2026-04-30).

Today’s items do not mention any new Federal Reserve supervisory document (SR letter/guidance/FAQ) referencing implementation of a new supervision manual for large/complex banks. Deadline (2026-09-30) is still ahead.
No reporting in today’s bullets indicates Trump Media & Technology Group and TAE Technologies filed an S-4 (or equivalent) with the SEC. Deadline (2026-03-31) remains in the future.
Today’s news does not reference a satellite-based quantum communications demonstration (QKD/entanglement) announcement. The deadline (2026-12-31) is still in the future.
